Blackjack

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Blackjack.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that simulates a player's hand of cards during a card game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Deck deck
      Shuffled deck which all hands draw from.
      private Card[] hand
      Array which stores the hand of cards.
      private int size
      How many cards are in the hand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      Default constructor which draws 2 cards (default starting Blackjack hand).
      Hand(int size)
      Constructor that takes a hand size and draws that many cards into the hand.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void forceNewDeck()
      Force a new deck to be created.
      Card getCard(int index)
      Get a card from the hand by its index.
      int getSize()
      Get the size of the hand.
      boolean hasAce()
      Check if there's an Ace in the hand.
      void hit()
      Add a single card to the hand from the deck.
      int sum()
      Sums up the hand using Blackjack rules for counting.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • deck

        private static Deck deck
        Shuffled deck which all hands draw from.

      • hand

        private Card[] hand
        Array which stores the hand of cards.

      • size

        private int size
        How many cards are in the hand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hand

        public Hand(int size)
        Constructor that takes a hand size and draws that many cards into the hand.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the hand to start with.
        Throws:
        HandBiggerThanDeckException - When the amount of cards in the hand is bigger than the whole deck.
        InvalidHandSizeException - When the size parameter isn't at least 1.

      • Hand

        public Hand()
        Default constructor which draws 2 cards (default starting Blackjack hand).

    • Method Detail

      • sum

        public int sum()
        Sums up the hand using Blackjack rules for counting.
        Returns:
        The sum of the hand.

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Add a single card to the hand from the deck.
        Throws:
        HandFullException - When the hand is already full and a hit cannot be completed.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get the size of the hand.
        Returns:
        How many cards are in the hand.

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(int index)
        Get a card from the hand by its index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the card to be returned, starting at 0.
        Returns:
        The card object at the given index.
        Throws:
        HandIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the index is below 0 or greater than hand size - 1.

      • hasAce

        public boolean hasAce()
        Check if there's an Ace in the hand.
        Returns:
        True if there's an ace, false if there aren't any aces.

      • forceNewDeck

        public static void forceNewDeck()
        Force a new deck to be created.
